typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (struct DataTypes.ReserveData memory)

getUserFactor(address).notice: Returns a factor for the user which should always be >= 1 for sufficiently         colletaralized positions and should get closer to 1 when collaterization level decreases This should be an aggregate value including all the collateral of the user

params.account: account for which to get the factor

topUp(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: Executes the top-up of a position.
